title: Jhin's Mask

Zed = Zero (0)
Garen = Salvador
Sona = Maya
Vi = Axton, lol

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
It would make a bit more sense to switch vi and garden around. Garden and axton are solders and Salvador and vi are berserkers(ish)

> [{quoted}](name=Frankensteinke,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pzzdnTzW,comment-id=000300020000,timestamp=2016-01-08T14:46:26.599+0000)
>
> It would make a bit more sense to switch vi and garden around. Garden and axton are solders and Salvador and vi are berserkers(ish)

I suppose you're right, but Garen and Sal are the only ones who regen health.

(...and Vi literally can't fight on par without her gloves, heh. )

Tho, I suppose Vi could also be Gaige, considering how Gaige is more popular than Axton. And A full AD Vi if played properly can have a similar impact to a Gaige with high Anarchy stacks, lol.

(I am not implying Vi is a crutch character, so we're clear. ^_^)

All three are beautiful. But what I love about masks is that they often reveal more than they obscure. The lines, the craftsmanship, the material that they're made of. A mask can be more than just a disguise or a symbol. It can be the window through which the world is perceived. Those who view the world through masks can often have very skewed views, like Guy Faux and V.

I always like to think of the example of Ben Kenobi's discussion about perspective with Luke on Degobah in Return of The Jedi.
Guy Fawkes* i think.
Aw shucks.
It's ok...not like it is a faux pas.
I see what you did there...I see what you did and I like it.
Reminds me of Shaco. {{champion:35}}

> [{quoted}](name=Valaran Nara,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=pzzdnTzW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-06T21:38:30.375+0000)

I didn't know that Shaco has a brother
It's just his clone with a new disguise :D
I hope he turns out to be a somewhat psycho adc from piltover. Someone with a flawed sense of justice and a weird sense of humour.
It's pretty obvious that he's going to be a serial killer with an obsession for making people "perfect" on par with Bioshock's JS Steinman

I really hope for him to be from Piltover.
I mean piltover didn't get any champions for a long time now(Vi was the last,since Jinx seems to be zaunite) and it looks like corki and heimerdinger are going to be more related to bandle city and less with piltover(as both are listed as bandle-city champs,unlike poppy or kennen who are listed as demacia/b-c or Ionia/b-c respectively)

Meaning that Piltover is a bit underrepresented at the moment with only {{champion:81}}{{champion:126}}{{champion:254}}{{champion:51}}&{{champion:61}}(zilean is also listed as one)
And well all of them are rather good characters,they are neutral at worst,so an evil piltovian would be a nice for a change.

The most interesting thing about Jhin's mask is that it doesn't look like its his. It looks like that's a severed head in a mask on his back.
shaclone became his own champ and got a new mask and weapon
You mean the Guy Faux mask...not v for vendetta

>This reminds me of Tribunal Mod for Skyrim.

There is a game.
It's called "Morrowind".
btw the tribunal mod came from the game morrowind
The mod i am referencing is the Tribunal Robes mod for Skyrim.
which came from the game 2 games before skyrim, morrowwind
I am not disputing that.

What if Link wears the mask?
https://45.media.tumblr.com/5135e91e466995f8ed95a40fea936e92/tumblr_mn2uz7uf3r1qltxk2o1_500.gif
oh wow a psycho mask{{champion:202}}
Worth noting that the mask at the end seems to be on someones back and you can see the outline of their shoulder and them walking away
If it were on his back we wouldn't see his eyes or chin.
Well, I don't see his chin anyway, and what makes you think he doesn't have an eye on his back? We don't even know if he's human yet.
Maybe because even all the non-Humans (Troll, Demon, Darkin, Yordles, Voidlings, Wraiths, and animals/animal humanoids) don't have eyes on the backs of their heads.
